title: Pixel 4 wont turn on nor charge at all. Completely Bricked
content: For the past two months and half I had a bricked Pixel 4 which wont charge or turn on what so ever even with Google's https://support.google.com/pixelphone/answer/7167687?hl=en support link. I have tried all the methods they have on their but everything is futile. Is their anyway to contact a google assistant I can't go any longer without my phone.
